title: Objective DB (Coming Soon)
desc: Objective SQL on tap in highly-available, dedicated PostgreSQL instances. Get instant data APIs for your serverless app. Scale to millions.

features.title: Object-Oriented in the CLoud
features.desc: Interact with remote data in the same object-oriented paradigm as your code.

features.title: Iterative Schemas. Instant APIs.
features.desc: Get auto-generated APIs (plus documentation) as you update your schema.

features.title: Auto-Backups. Fully-Managed.
features.desc: Take advantage of a fully managed platform to keep you focused on your app!

features.title: Robust. Auto-Scaling.
features.desc: Think big on an enterprise-ready infrastructure! Scale up with no extra effort.
